title: BIG FACTS feat. KANDI
itunes:title: BIG FACTS feat. KANDI
description:
On this edition of BIG FACTS, the crew debates about money vs. poverty and true colors.

BIG FACTS weclomes music icon and entrepreneur KANDI to discuss her business ventures, staying relevant, ATL waterboys, Clubhouse, The Grammys, RHOA, IVF and more!
